library(ggplot2)          
inputFile="input.xls" 
outFile="SV.boundary.TE.Median.pdf" 
rt=read.table(inputFile,header=T,sep="\t") 
pdf(file=outFile, width=6, height=5)
ggplot(rt,aes(Region,Median,group=Type,color=Type))+
	geom_point(size=4)+
	geom_line(position = position_dodge(0.1),cex=1.3)+
	scale_color_manual(values = c("#53B3E9", "#E39500"))+
	labs(x='SV boundary',y='Median of total length')+
	scale_y_continuous(limits = c(40,280),expand = c(0,0),breaks = c(40,80,120,160,200,240,280),label = c(40,80,120,160,200,240,280))+
	theme_test(base_size = 15)+
	theme(legend.title = element_blank(),
        legend.position = c(.2,.9),
        legend.direction = "horizontal")

dev.off()
